text:
@realDonaldTrump So The President of The United States is getting screened???WTF
OPEN OUR BUSINESS AND OUR COUNTRY. Get 2nd and 3rd opinions on the Covid-19 Pandemic and push to get a vaccine. Our county was not built to close!
